mapper.insert: insert into orders(ordersId, goodsId, account, consignee, orderAdress, num, total, theTime, orderState, customerPhone) values (#{ordersId},#{goodsId},#{account},#{consignee},#{orderAdress},#{num},#{total},#{theTime},#{orderState},#{customerPhone})
mapper.update: update orders set orderState = #{orderState} where ordersId = #{ordersId}
mapper.select: select ordersId, goodsId, account, consignee, orderAdress, num, total, theTime, orderState, customerPhone from orders order by ordersId
